vscodium.description: Binary release of VS Code without MS branding/telemetry/licensing

neovim.description: Vim-fork focused on extensibility and usability

fzf.description: A better way to navigate directories

kitty.download: curl -L https://sw.kovidgoyal.net/kitty/installer.sh | sh /dev/stdin && ln -sf ~/.local/kitty.app/bin/kitty ~/.local/kitty.app/bin/kitten ~/.local/bin/ && cp ~/.local/kitty.app/share/applications/kitty.desktop ~/.local/share/applications/ && cp ~/.local/kitty.app/share/applications/kitty-open.desktop ~/.local/share/applications/ && sed -i "s|Icon=kitty|Icon=$(readlink -f ~)/.local/kitty.app/share/icons/hicolor/256x256/apps/kitty.png|g" ~/.local/share/applications/kitty*.desktop && sed -i "s|Exec=kitty|Exec=$(readlink -f ~)/.local/kitty.app/bin/kitty|g" ~/.local/share/applications/kitty*.desktop && echo 'kitty.desktop' > ~/.config/xdg-terminals.list
